data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you think that hard work is enough, or does a person also need some talent to achieve difficult goals? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: Some people hold the view that talent is essential for achieving goals. While there are undoubtedly valid viewpoints, on the contrary, I believe that hard work is imperative to success. That is to say, if a person does not care about the painstaking work, then his indolence will ultimately affect his achievements. According to a joint effort by five leading Universities in the US and the UK, 76 percent of the interviewees who agree with backbreaking work, have expressed that they have better performance at work. To put it in a nutshell, we may safely conclude that hard work is the real key to success.（105 字）
